messages.body:
From the devious mind and multiple personalities of "Bo Kaow" comes  The Widow Scambait - a dramatic story of love, money and disaster, in which Agnes Gambore, the African widow, befriends the Dutch Churchwarden Bo Kaow - or does she? Will she play fast and loose with his heart?

"....it's a fairly long but interesting love story where I managed to pull the lads quite a bit off-script.
Best regards
Bo Kaow (Who isn't really Bo Kaow, but you knew that.)"


Cast:
The lads:
, wealthy widow living in a refugee camp
, Barrister Lad
, director of Union Security, Banker Lad

The baiter/s:
 - lonely Dutch Church Warden with a good but frail heart
 - Bo's brother
 - Bo's angry German friend


Classically scamalicious elements are called out here and there for the edification of the new visitor.
messages.raw:
Updated may 12, 2008

From the devious mind and multiple personalities of "Bo Kaow" comes The Widow Scambait - a dramatic story of love, money and disaster, in which Agnes Gambore, the African widow, befriends the Dutch Churchwarden Bo Kaow - or does she? Will she play fast and loose with his heart?

"....it's a fairly long but interesting love story where I managed to pull the lads quite a bit off-script.
Best regards
Bo Kaow (Who isn't really Bo Kaow, but you knew that.)"

Cast:

The lads:
Mrs Agnes Gambore, wealthy widow living in a refugee camp
Barrister Solomon Godspower, Barrister Lad
Dr E.D. James, director of Union Security, Banker Lad

The baiter/s:
Bo Kaow - lonely Dutch Church Warden with a good but frail heart
Albert Kaow - Bo's brother
Bohika Kautz - Bo's angry German friend

Classically scamalicious elements are called out here and there for the edification of the new visitor.

messages.subject: My beloved, Bo Kaow
messages.body:
My beloved, 

I am Mrs Agnes Gambore,wife to late Samuel Gambore,a
major sponsor to the opposition movement in Republic of Chad.My husband was
murdered in cold blood by ruling government syndicates in 2005.After murdering
my husband,they convinced me that my life is highly insecured through their
several threats to my life in their mission to close every chapter about the
family of my late husband.

In my helpless situation,i managed through the helpof a family friend in Lome Togo,West Africa to secure political assylum in Togo,West
Africa.Now,i am in the Refugee Camp where my movenment is highly monitored and
restricted.

Before the sudden death of my husband,he told me in
confidence that he deposited a metal box containing a total amount of ( $25,000,000.00USD
) with a security firm in Lome Togo,West Africa.This was also done with the
help of that same family friend who happens to be a practising lawyer in
Togo.My late husband revealed to me that he deposited the box as family
treasures of Gold&Diamond.Even the security firm and his lawyer friend do
not know the real content of the metal box.

Now that i have succeeded in finding my way to Togo,i need a foreigner like you who
will be God- fearing to assist and help me out of my immediate predicament by
claiming and securing the metal box from the security firm in Togo,for safe keeping and investment
purposes in your country.Since i intend to invest in your country,i shall also
live the rest of my life with my only child who is 9years now,and whoever God
will provide for me in your country.You will not have any problem at all in
securing the box from the security firm because you will be guided and legally
backed-up by the family lawyer for easy claim.

What i need from you is just; 
1)Your full names.................................................. 
2)Your telphone/fax numbers................................ 
3)Your residential address.....................................
4)Your correct age and occupation........................ 

Get back to me with above requested information,then
we can proceed.
Thanks and God bless you,

Sincerely yours,
Mrs.Agnes Gambore.

messages.body:
My beloved Bo Kaow,

I got your mail.

To be very sincere with you,i found you through a personalsearch for someone that will be God-fearing and will not betray me for anyreason.This was done after very committed prayer for God to reveal the rightperson to me.Therefore,i know and strongly believe that my mail got to theright and intended person.Please,i will like you to see our coming together asdivine act of God for mutual benefits.And i contacted you for you to assist meout of my present predicaments.

For your clarification and understanding,i accept to let you take 40% of thetotal amount,while 60% will be for me on successful completion of theproject.Since i'm helpless in my situation now,i pray and strongly beleive you arean honest person and will not betray me at the end.

Having clarified you on the sharing ratio,i encourage you to send me requestedinformation to convince me of your willingness to help me in this project.Andas soon as i receive requested information,i shall release to you contact ofthe family lawyer who will introduce you to the security/finance company inTogo.He will also guide and back you up legally to ensure success 
I await your fast and positiveresponse to this mail,so we can proceed without delay.

Thanks and God bless you abundantly as you assist me sincerely to ensurecomplete success and mutual benefit in this project.

Sincerely yours,
Mrs.Agnes Gambore.

Dear Agnes,

Wow, 40% of 25 million US Dollars! While I still don't understand why you picked me I must say that you have caught my attention. Can you please explain how this would work again? And it's nothing illegal is it? I am a very Christian man you know and a trusted member of my local fisherman's church. 

I await your urgent response.
Best regards
Bo Kaow

messages.body:
Dear Angnes,

It is I who should thank you. You seem like a wonderful person, generous ofheart and spirit. Maybe you are a gift from God? Before we go any further inour relationship I want you to tell me a little more about yourself, and canyou please send me a picture of yourself?
Myself, I am church-warden in Friesland, TheNetherlands, 56 years old and a widower. I spend a lot of my free time playingboule. Do you know the game boule? It takes a lot of skill and practice I cantell you!

Please, I ask you, how can we proceed with our little adventure? Below are mycontact details. 
Agnes, I hope this does not put you off, but due to my work as thechurch-warden one of my responsibilities are to ring the church bells...it is alovely task, but has over the years unfortunately rendered my hearing somewhatinadequate...hence I have no use for a regular telephone. If you have access toa text-telephone that works, otherwise I will have to ask you that we do ourtalking over e-mail for the time being. Once we meet my hearing aid willsuffice, don't worry!

I can't wait for your reply!
Your Bo
p.s.: I will be out of town until this sunday andwon't be able to respond in a few days, please have a few days patience.


My details:
Bo Floyd Kaow
TEXT-telephone: +31(0)20 xxx xxxx 
Herenweg 46-46A, 1715 EH Spanbroek, Netherlands
Age: 56
Occupation: Church-warden

messages.body:
My darling Angnes,

I really get so happy every time I get an e-mail from you. I hope you think ofme too in that way? I really feel that we have a divine connection!

I have contacted Mr Solomon and asked him to provide me with the paperworkneeded for the transactions.

Now, I hope you don't get mad at me for this, but I also asked him to preparethe paperwork to ensure that you can legally re-marry. You see, I think you area good woman whom I can learn to love for real. I also think it would show amutual trust in regards to the money, so that none of us will feel the fearthat we would get tricked. So, what do you say? Should we get married? Make mea happy man and say YES! Your daugther I'd be willing to adopt too of course. 

Please also send me a photo of you and your daugther.

With love
Bo

messages.body:
Dear Mr Solomon,

Thank you for attending the business whilst I was away. I shall be looking forward to hearing from the Union Security company.

Also, I am glad to inform you that dear Agnes have accepted my proposal for marriage, and that we shall be getting married soon, which should prove all transactions easier aswell as increase the trust between the mutual partners in this lucrative transaction. 
This also means that I will have to get legal confirmation on Mrs Gambore's maritial status, so that we conduct no illegal acts when married. I shall ask Agnes to contact you on the matter so that you can prepare the papers with the legal status of Mrs Gambore. Not that I do not trust her, but I wish to for all of ours sake make sure that everything is done in the correct manners.

yours truly
Bo

messages.body:
Darling Agnes,

You have just made me the happiest man on Earth! I love you!
I have spent every minute on my trip to the Dutch islands thinking about youand your son, and how we can ensure our long last happy marriage. I have ofcourse already been in contact with the good Barrister Solomon and asked him toprepare the neccessary paperwork. The transaction papers are filed and sent tothe security company, so this should be on the way too.
I will however, for the best of our mutual interest just want to be sure that your legal status is legit, so that we can re-marry without problems and getting you and your son into the EU. What is his name by the way? You did not tell me.

Also, please tell me what your favourite foods are, and what you like to cook? I am only a master of fish-dishes myself.

I will send my own photo as soon as I have located a scanner.
Looking forward to your reply
Your Bo

From Mrs Josephine U.Sibigam .

Front until he was dethroned and arrested early last year by PresidentTEJAN KABBAH which later handed him over to the United
Nations war crime tribunal were he later died in detention.As a resultof this position in the government,my son (SIBIGAM  UWANDI) and ltried and later succeeded in securing some of his assets,which include mansionsand physical cash. This is to avoid The present government from confiscatinghis entire property. 

We left Sierra Leone withthe total amount US$26.5 Million (Twenty Six Million Five Hundred ThousandUnited States Dollars) only, which we Brought to Belguim and depositedsame with SAFE TRUST BANK IN BELGUIM ,as valuable documents belonging to ourforeign affiliate. After depositing the money, my family and I were asked toleave BELGUIM and was made public on BELGUIM  National Headlines, wewere left with no option than to seek refuge in my homeland in NEAR BYCOUNTRY HERE IN Benin repubic of Cotonou . Thesecurity company bank later asked me,to come and claim the consignmentimmediately to avoid the money being confiscated. 

I arrived here a couple of days ago and through a good contact l applied for arefugee status as an asylum seeker, which is still pending in Foreign AffairsDepartment.The problem now is that because of our status,we cannot risk movingthe money without help hence I am looking for a trustworthy partner, who canhelp me move this money out of Belgium .Inthat case, I want to know if you can help me transfer the fund into youraccount in your country or elsewhere since time is not on my side. 

As a widow of three children I need your urgent attention to this matter..It istrue that we have neither met nor known each other before, but the informationI gathered of your credibility makes me believe that with trust and honesty wewill achieve a huge success in about a week. I will also leave with youfrom Belguim  to your country immediately the money goes into your account.

This is simple, I will like you to provide immediately your 
1.Your full names 
2.Contact address 
3.Your direct telephone and Fax number 
4.Your age 
5.Your marital status 

Based on the following informaion been provide by you My lawyer,who know all thefull details on how you will received the fund will prepare the necessarydocuments and affidavits which will put you in place as the ownerof the fund.For your noble assistance and well assured of safeguarding the whole Fund underyour care, I will offer you 40% of the total sum,while 10% will be set asidefor expenses incurred on the cause of this transaction by both parties, whilethe remaining %50 will be for me and my family. I want to assure you that thisbusiness is completely risk free because every arrangement has been made for asuccessful deal.I expect your immediate response so that we can conclude theTransaction in the very shortest time. It is very important that you keep thisbusiness HIGHY CONFIDENTIAL because I do not want anything to happen to thisfund. 

Thanks and God bless. 
Best regard's 
Mrs.Josephine Sibigam U.

messages.body:
My Dear Agnes,
This is Bo's brother , writing to you. I am sorry to inform you that Bo is presently in the hospital after suffering a terrible heart attack earlier this morning. It happened in the bank where I was accompanying him for some bank errands he was supposed to do today. As we were entering the bank poor Bo fainted and had to be taken by ambulance to the St Fisericks Hospital where he now is resting. He is stable, but the doctor's do not yet have an answer for when he will wake up. I am now in the process of notifying Bo's friends and I found your adress on printed out e-mails here in Bo's office. Bo has been very secretive about you but I understand that he is trying to help you out somehow? If I can be of any help while Bo is in the hospital, please let me know.

I do not have an e-mail account myself as I do not care much for computers, but I have access to Bo's computer and e-mail adress here which you can use.

Yours truly
Albert Kaow

messages.body:
Agnes!

It's me Bo, I just got home from the hospital and thanks
to Albert I have understood that you have really stood by me during
this horrible period. I can't begin to tell you how close to death I
have been. I actually saw the white light at the end of the tunnel, but
somehow I was pulled back and I believe it was by your love! I can only
pray to God that you are still ok and haven't been reached by the thugs
that were after you. Please write me and tell me how you are!!

As
you know I was in the bank to wire your barrister the 2500$ for your
trip when I had the heart attack...I assume it was from the worry and
stress over you that actually caused my old ticker to say stop...It was
so painful you wouldn't believe it. But I shall not tire you with my
petty problems when you are in a far worser place. My only regret is
that we did not manage to complete the transaction before the ambulance
came for me, I still want to get you out of the camp, so please tell me
if mr Godspower still can arrange your safe passage out?

Please let mr Godspower know that I am back home and can help you out.

God bless you my love,
Your Bo

messages.body:
My Darling,

I am so happy to hear from you! I have been very weak the last two
days and lain in bed, but I am recovering good now and am waiting for
physiotherapy from the aftermaths of my heart attack. I feel so ashamed
over my condition, when you really need so much help. It seems like my
brother Albert has re-arranged my computer...he's not very savvy with
technological things, i', amazed he managed to use my e-mail even! But
in the process I think he deleted a few of my e-mail archives...would
you be so kind to ask Mr Godspower to contact me directly again, and
re-send the money transfer details so that I do not send the money to
the wrong person..that would be a disaster!

Can I also ask you to make sure that your passport is in order? I wish to send an old friend of mine down to Ghana to pick you and the boy up and take you to me here in Holland. I can't wait to see you!

With Love
Bo

messages.body:
My Beloved Bo, 

I am Mrs Agnes Gambore,wife to late Samuel Gambore,a
major sponsor to the opposition movement in Republic of Chad.My husband was
murdered in cold blood by ruling government syndicates in 2005.After murdering
my husband,they convinced me that my life is highly insecured through their
several threats to my life in their mission to close every chapter about the
family of my late husband.

In my helpless situation,i managed through the helpof a family friend in Lome Togo,West Africa to secure political assylum in Togo,West
Africa.Now,i am in the Refugee Camp where my movenment is highly monitored and
restricted.

Before the sudden death of my husband,he told me in
confidence that he deposited a metal box containing a total amount of ( $25,000,000.00USD
) with a security firm in Lome Togo,West Africa.This was also done with the
help of that same family friend who happens to be a practising lawyer in
Togo.My late husband revealed to me that he deposited the box as family
treasures of Gold&Diamond.Even the security firm and his lawyer friend do
not know the real content of the metal box.

Now that i have succeeded in finding my way to Togo,i need a foreigner like you who
will be God- fearing to assist and help me out of my immediate predicament by
claiming and securing the metal box from the security firm in Togo,for safe keeping and investment
purposes in your country.Since i intend to invest in your country,i shall also
live the rest of my life with my only child who is 9years now,and whoever God
will provide for me in your country.You will not have any problem at all in
securing the box from the security firm because you will be guided and legally
backed-up by the family lawyer for easy claim.

What i need from you is just; 
1)Your full names.................................................. 
2)Your telphone/fax numbers................................ 
3)Your residential address.....................................
4)Your correct age and occupation........................ 

Get back to me with above requested information,then
we can proceed.
Thanks and God bless you,

Sincerely yours,
Mrs.Agnes Gambore.
